Name: Rhodes
Notes: Son of Ruby, red dwarf star with crimson glow, first celestial lover bound to Marigold

Name: Marigold
Notes: Daughter of Chrystella, bright main sequence star, first celestial lover bound to Rhodes

Name: Ruby
Notes: Red dwarf star goddess, mother of Rhodes

Name: Chrystella
Notes: Main sequence star goddess, mother of Marigold

Name: Nova
Notes: Cosmic phenomenon personified, represents the cyclical bursts of love between Rhodes and Marigold
